description: Make entertaining easy with this Mexican-inspired board complete with crunchy tortilla cups, seasoned mince and a selection of tasty toppings.
name: Mexican-Style Board Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray
0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped
0.66 cup Woolworths smokey chipotle cheddar & tasty cheese shredded blend

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease 8 holes of a 12-hole, 1/3 -cup capacity muffin pan. Line 8 holes with tortillas, crimping as required, to form a cup. Lightly spray with oil. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Stand for 5 minutes to cool slightly (tortillas will firm up).

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add half of the onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Add mince and cook for 8 minutes, breaking up with a wooden spoon, or until browned. Add taco seasoning and 3/4 cup water. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes or until slightly thickened. Transfer to a serving bowl.
Juice 1 lime. Combine tomato, coriander and half of the lime juice in a bowl. Season. Mash avocado until almost smooth and add Tabasco and remaining lime juice. Season and stir to combine.
Cut remaining lime into wedges. Arrange tortilla cups on a board with mince mixture, tomato salsa, guacamole, lettuce, jalapeño, cheese and lime wedges. Serve.
